trans-unit.source: Specifies whether a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> control redistributes space between rows or between columns.
trans-unit.target: Especifica se um controle <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" /> redistribui espaço entre linhas ou entre colunas.

trans-unit.source: Use this enumeration to set the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> property of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> control.
trans-unit.target: Use esta enumeração para definir o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter.ResizeDirection%2A> propriedade o <xref:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter> controle.

trans-unit.source: Space is redistributed based on the values of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth" />, and <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight" /> properties of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.
trans-unit.target: O espaço é redistribuído com base nos valores das propriedades <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment" />, <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth" /> e <see cref="P:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight" /> do <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.GridSplitter" />.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between columns.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch>, espaço é redistribuído entre colunas.

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> is set to <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> and the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> is not set to <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, space is redistributed between rows.
trans-unit.target: Se o <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.HorizontalAlignment%2A> é definido como <xref:System.Windows.HorizontalAlignment.Stretch> e <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.VerticalAlignment%2A> não está definido como <xref:System.Windows.VerticalAlignment.Stretch>, espaço é redistribuído entre linhas.

trans-unit.source: If the following conditions are true, space is redistributed between columns:
trans-unit.target: Se as seguintes condições forem verdadeiras, o espaço é redistribuído entre colunas:

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> is less than or equal to the <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualWidth%2A> é menor que ou igual a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.ActualHeight%2A>.

trans-unit.source: If the following conditions are true, space is redistributed between rows:
trans-unit.target: Se as seguintes condições forem verdadeiras, o espaço é redistribuído entre linhas:
O espaço é redistribuído entre colunas.
O espaço é redistribuído entre linhas.
